articles.title: Want to retire at 65 with $2 million? Here’s how much to save each month - CNBC
articles.description: Most Americans hope to retire as millionaires, Bankrate reports. Here's how much to set aside each month to save $2 million by the time you turn 65.
articles.content:
Young Americans have mixed feelings about their ability to reach their retirement savings goals.
